ï»¿"I declare before you all that my whole life,...
...whether it be long or short, shall be devoted to your service."
Words delivered to the people of Britain by then Princess Elizabeth...
...as she paid tribute to her subjects throughout the British Empire...
...and marked the occasion of her 21st birthday, April 21st 1947.
Decades later, as Queen Elizabeth II prepares to celebrate...
...these words still ring true for her supporters.
For millions, the longest-serving monarch in British history...
...is a part of the fabric of UK society...
....and a steadfast constant in their lives.
